issue.title: [R] converting from R vector to Array when the R vector is altrep
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14259](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14259). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When we have an R vector that was created from an Array with altrep, and then we want to convert again to an Array, currently it materializes it, and it should not. Instead it should be grabbing the array from the internals -of the altrep object.
